name: 15-Min FX Order-Block Volume Spike Strategy
description: Intraday forex strategy that trades EUR/USD and GBP/USD on a 15-minute chart. It detects institutional order blocks and requires a volume spike (≥120 % of 20-bar SMA) during the break of the block’s extreme for entry. Risk is capped to 1 % of equity per trade with fixed-percent exits and a suggested discretionary 0.3 % trailing stop.
